insert into member_tl_invite (invitor_member_id, invitor_open_member_id, invitor_realname, invitor_mobile, invitee_member_id, invitee_open_member_id, invitee_realname, invitee_mobile, invite_time, invite_source) values (#{invitorMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invitorOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invitorRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invitorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteeMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inviteeOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inviteeRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteeMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inviteSource,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update member_tl_invite set invitor_member_id = #{invitorMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invitor_open_member_id = #{invitorOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invitor_realname = #{invitorRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invitor_mobile = #{invitorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invitee_member_id = #{inviteeMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invitee_open_member_id = #{inviteeOpenMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invitee_realname = #{inviteeRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invitee_mobile = #{inviteeMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_time = #{inviteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invite_source = #{inviteSource,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
